price: እምቢም ቢሉ (በማወቅ) በእኩልነት ላይ ኾነን (የታዘዝኩትን) አስታውቅኋችሁ፡፡ «የምትስፈራሩበትም ነገር ቅርብ ወይም ሩቅ መኾኑን አላውቅም፤» በላቸው፡፡
arabic: فَإِن تَوَلَّوۡاْ فَقُلۡ ءَاذَنتُكُمۡ عَلَىٰ سَوَآءٖۖ وَإِنۡ أَدۡرِيٓ أَقَرِيبٌ أَم بَعِيدٞ مَّا تُوعَدُونَ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-in tawallaw faqul ādhantukum ʿalā sawāin wa-in adrī aqarībun am baʿīdun mā tūʿadūna
